text: I'm currently a technical lead and web developer, primarily using PHP and several JS frameworks, including Angular 4 and Ember.js. I have experience in tooling and ops, introducing continuous integration and administering our local Gitlab and Jenkins instances and other connected NodeJS applications, including a backend API service for a developer dashboard. At my previous position I was responsible for maintaining a Java codebase for a sensor data aggregation system for the US Navy.
The project I'm most excited about is designing and implementing an event log architecture using Redis Streams for the Software Engineering Daily open source application.
